module.name: Directory
module.changelog: *12.0.2* FREEPBX-7418 Default Directory Disappearing, FREEPBX-8432 error logged everytime someone acesses IVR *12.0.1* FREEPBX-7753 Support French accents in driectory *12.0.0* Remove Toggle Val, use HTML5 placeholder instead *2.11.0.5* Include license file *2.11.0.4* FREEPBX-7244 The Asterisk Manager connnection needs to be made regardless. *2.11.0.3* #6354 *2.11.0.2* #6354, #6840 *2.11.0.1* #6882, #6913 *2.11.0.0* #6051 *2.10.0.10* re #5784 - *2.10.0.9* assotred bug fixes *2.10.0.8* #5551 *2.10.0.7* smoother experience when using flite *2.10.0.6* re #1076, #1067 - clarify help text, fix directory hook for ivr *2.10.0.5* Security update; downstream changes *2.10.0.4* Security update; downstream changes *2.10.0.3* Security update; downstream changes *2.10.0.2* #5463 *2.10.0.1* #5389 *2.10.0.0* new version changes
